amendment.description: To reduce waste in Department of Defense contracting.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4261 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4261 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To reduce waste in Department of Defense contracting.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4261 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4261 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Grassley.
